import React, { useState } from "react"; function InvestForm(props) { const [yearsData, setYearsData] = useState([ { currentSavings: "", yearlySavings: "", expectedReturn: "", investmentDuration: "", }, ]); const handleSubmit = (event) => { event.preventDefault(); props.calculate(); console.log("Form submitted:"); }; return (

YEAR NUMBER TOTAL SAVINGS END OF YEAR INTEREST GAINED IN YEAR TOTAL INTEREST GAINED TOTAL INVESTED CAPITAL
); } export default InvestForm;
